certificate.Description: Base-64 representation of the X509 leaf certificate .cer file or just .pem file content.

isVerified.Description: True indicates that the certificate will be created in verified state and proof of possession will not be required.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

expiry.Description: The certificate's expiration date and time.

isVerified.Description: Determines whether certificate has been verified.

certificate.Description: base-64 representation of X509 certificate .cer file or just .pem file content.

created.Description: The certificate's creation date and time.

updated.Description: The certificate's last update date and time.

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

etag.Description: The Etag field is *not* required. If it is provided in the response body, it must also be provided as a header per the normal ETag convention.

properties.Description: Service specific properties for a provisioning service

sku.Description: Sku info for a provisioning Service.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

state.Description: Current state of the provisioning service.

publicNetworkAccess.Description: Whether requests from Public Network are allowed

privateEndpointConnections.Description: Private endpoint connections created on this IotHub

provisioningState.Description: The ARM provisioning state of the provisioning service.

iotHubs.Description: List of IoT hubs associated with this provisioning service.

allocationPolicy.Description: Allocation policy to be used by this provisioning service.

deviceProvisioningHostName.Description: Device endpoint for this provisioning service.

idScope.Description: Unique identifier of this provisioning service.

authorizationPolicies.Description: List of authorization keys for a provisioning service.

enableDataResidency.Description:
Optional.
Indicates if the DPS instance has Data Residency enabled, removing the cross geo-pair disaster recovery.

filterName.Description: The name of the IP filter rule.

action.Description: The desired action for requests captured by this rule.

ipMask.Description: A string that contains the IP address range in CIDR notation for the rule.

target.Description: Target for requests captured by this rule.

properties.Description: The properties of a private endpoint connection

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

privateEndpoint.Description: The private endpoint property of a private endpoint connection

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.Description: The current state of a private endpoint connection

status.Description: The status of a private endpoint connection

description.Description: The description for the current state of a private endpoint connection

actionsRequired.Description: Actions required for a private endpoint connection

applyAllocationPolicy.Description: flag for applying allocationPolicy or not for a given iot hub.

allocationWeight.Description: weight to apply for a given iot h.

name.Description: Host name of the IoT hub.

connectionString.Description: Connection string of the IoT hub.

location.Description: ARM region of the IoT hub.

tier.Description: Pricing tier name of the provisioning service.

capacity.Description: The number of units to provision

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

value.Description: The list of shared access policies.
